actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To designate "The Most Beautiful Lady in the World", by Helmut Christopher Calabrese and Paul L. Calabrese, as the official anthem of the Statue of Liberty.
short_title: Official Anthem of the Statue of Liberty

summary.text: Official Anthem of the Statue of Liberty - States that it is the intent of the 103d Congress to memorialize "The Most Beautiful Lady in the World" written and composed by Helmut C. Calabrese and Paul L. Calabrese and to dedicate it as the official anthem of the Statue of Liberty.

titles.title: Official Anthem of the Statue of Liberty
To designate "The Most Beautiful Lady in the World", by Helmut Christopher Calabrese and Paul L. Calabrese, as the official anthem of the Statue of Liberty.
